metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010006 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Evince 3.26.0 is affected by buffer overflow. The impact is: DOS / Possiblecode execution. The component is: backend/tiff/tiff-document.c. The attackvector is: Victim must open a crafted PDF file. The issue occurs because ofan incorrect integer overflow protection mechanism in tiff_document_renderand tiff_document_get_thumbnail.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

evince - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
evince-common - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
evince-gtk - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
gir1.2-evince-3.0 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
libevdocument3-4 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
libevview3-3 - 3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: evince package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.2-1ubuntu4.6').
atril package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
